author: Tay Yong Kwang J:
casename: Kimly Construction Pte Ltd v Lee Tong Boon (trading as Rango Machinery Services) (Tan Juay Pah, third party;; Feng Tianming and another, fourth parties)
counsel: Christopher Chuah and Joyce Ng (WongPartnership LLP) for the plaintiff; Roderick Edward Martin and Mohamed Baiross (Martin & Partners) for the defendant; Manjit Singh s/o Kirpal Singh and Sree Govind Menon (Manjit Govind & Partners) for the third party; Siaw Kheng Boon (Siaw Kheng Boon & Co) for the first fourth party; Ramasamy s/o Karuppan Chettiar and Navin Kripalani (ACIES Law Corporation) for the second fourth party.
